attributes.action: ask richard branson to reduce the interest rates on his virgin credit card
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have had a virgin credit card for many years, they now charge me 2.5292% per month in interest charges on the balance. I have asked many times, "please reduce my rate of interest rate, so I can pay off the balance" They say they can't!!
The apr is over 30% per year, paying the minimum payment it will never pay off the balance.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
